TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit StaticSiteMapProvider extends System.Web.SiteMapProvider
Public MustInherit Class StaticSiteMapProvider Inherits SiteMapProvider
public ref class StaticSiteMapProvider abstract : System::Web::SiteMapProvider

summary.span: 作为 抽象类的部分实现和 类（它是 ASP.NET 中的默认站点地图提供程序）的基类。

span.span: Serves as a partial implementation of the abstract class and serves as a base class for the class, which is the default site map provider in ASP.NET.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是抽象的部分实现类并提供了两个其他的方法：和，以及抽象和受保护方法。The class is a partial implementation of the abstract class and supplies two additional methods: and , as well as the abstract and protected methods. 类支持编写站点映射提供程序 (例如， ) 转换为另一个在内存中存储的持久存储中存储站点图。The class supports writing a site map provider (for example, an ) that translates a site map that is stored in persistent storage to one that is stored in memory. 类提供基本实现，用于存储和检索对象。The class provides basic implementations for storing and retrieving objects. 和类支持的站点映射提供程序层次结构，其中，站点地图提供商提供可以与其他站点地图提供商有层次结构关系的概念。The and classes support the concept of a site map provider hierarchy, where a site map provider can have a hierarchical relationship with other site map providers. 与实现此模式和属性。This pattern is implemented with the and properties. 类存储其哈希表中的对象，并且在内部使用的页面，表示由站点地图节点，作为键的属性。The class stores its objects in hash tables and internally uses the property of the pages, represented by site map nodes, as keys. （如果站点映射节点不指定 URL，它会跟踪使用自动生成的唯一键。）因此，不能具有站点地图节点站点地图节点，使用相同的 URL 使用其中一次。(If a site map node does not specify a URL, it is tracked using an automatically generated unique key.) As a result, you cannot have site map nodes wherein a site map node with the same URL is used more than once. 例如，尝试加载使用下面的代码示例所示站点地图节点类，它是默认 ASP.NET 站点映射提供程序或派生自任何站点地图提供商提供类将无效，因为AboutUs.aspx 页被多次使用。For example, attempting to load the site map node illustrated in the following code example with the class, which is the default ASP.NET site map provider, or any site map provider that is derived from the class will not work because the AboutUs.aspx page is used more than once. ``` ``` 如果要扩展类，这三个最重要的方法为， ，和方法。If you are extending the class, the three most important methods are the , , and methods. 和方法具有足以满足大多数自定义站点映射提供程序实现的默认实现。The and methods have default implementations that are sufficient for most custom site map provider implementations. 方法调用以初始化派生的站点映射的提供程序，包括加载站点地图数据，所需的任何资源，但未尝试生成站点地图节点在内存中的。The method is called to initialize derived site map providers, including any resources that are required to load site map data, but it does attempt to build the site map node in memory. 如果派生的类使用文件来存储站点地图数据，可以在此处执行任何文件初始化。If your derived class is using files to store site map data, any file initialization can be performed here. 如果站点映射节点使用某些其他类型的数据存储，如关系数据库中，连接的初始化可能会执行此处。If the site map node uses some other type of data store, such as a relational database, initializing a connection might be performed here. 其他属性，如文件名或放置在配置的站点映射提供程序元素的连接字符串是由 ASP.NET 配置系统处理并传递到方法替换`attributes`参数。Additional attributes, such as file names or connection strings that are placed on the site map provider element in the configuration are processed by the ASP.NET configuration system and passed to the method with the `attributes` parameter. 所有派生自的类必须重写方法类并调用以从持久性存储区加载站点映射节点并将其转换为内部表示形式。The method must be overridden by all classes that are derived from the class and is called to load the site map node from persistent storage and convert it to an internal representation. 方法在内部调用中的默认成员实现多种和类。The method is called internally in many of the default member implementations of the and classes. 如果你实现自己站点映射的提供程序，确保站点地图数据处理发生一次，并且后续调用方法立即返回，如果在已加载站点映射信息。If you implement your own site map provider, ensure that site map data processing occurs once and subsequent calls to the method return immediately, if site map information has already been loaded. 当实现方法中，确保它是线程安全的因为多个并发的页请求可以间接导致多个调用来加载站点映射信息。When you implement the method, ensure it is thread safe, as multiple concurrent page requests can result indirectly in multiple calls to load site map information. 站点地图基础结构支持基于用户的角色的显示站点映射信息。The site map infrastructure supports displaying site map information based on the user's role. 具体取决于属性支持的单个存在的对象，不同的导航结构可以为不同的用户。Depending on the property that are supported by the individual objects, a different navigation structure can exist for different users. 站点的默认实现将映射的节点检索成员类自动执行安全修整通过调用方法。The default implementations of the site map node retrieval members of the class perform security trimming automatically by calling the method. ，和方法操作以线程安全的方式跟踪站点地图节点所使用的内部集合。The , and methods manipulate the internal collections that are used to track site map nodes in a thread-safe manner. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何可以扩展类以用作站点地图提供商提供的 Microsoft Access。The following code example demonstrates how you to extend the class to use Microsoft Access as a site map provider. `AccessSiteMapProvider`类是站点地图支持的提供程序仅简单，一个级别深层层次结构。The `AccessSiteMapProvider` class is a site map provider that supports only a simple, one-level-deep hierarchy. 站点地图数据存储在表具有以下结构：The table that the site map data is stored in has the following structure: ``` NODEID URL NAME PARENTNODEID --------------------------------------------- 1 default.aspx Default 2 catalog.aspx Catalog 1 3 aboutus.aspx Contact Us 1 ... ``` `AccessSiteMapProvider`类派生自类，并从 Microsoft Access 数据库使用基本的 SQL 查询中检索其信息和和对象。The `AccessSiteMapProvider` class is derived from the class and retrieves its information from a Microsoft Access database using basic SQL queries and the and objects. [!code-cpp[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.AccessSiteMapProvider_1#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.AccessSiteMapProvider_1/CPP/accesssitemapprovider.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.AccessSiteMapProvider_1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.AccessSiteMapProvider_1/CS/accesssitemapprovider.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.AccessSiteMapProvider_1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.AccessSiteMapProvider_1/VB/accesssitemapprovider.vb#1)] 最后，`AccessSiteMapProvider`配置为默认的提供程序的以下的 Web.config 文件中。Finally, the `AccessSiteMapProvider` is configured as the default provider in the following Web.config file. ``` ```

summary.span: 向站点地图提供程序维护的集合添加一个 ，并建立 对象之间的父/子关系。

span.span: Adds a to the collections that are maintained by the site map provider and establishes a parent/child relationship between the objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由站点映射节点`node`参数添加到内部集合和与由标识站点映射节点之间创建父-子关系`parentNode`参数。The site map node that is identified by the `node` parameter is added to an internal collection and a parent-child relationship is created between it and the site map node that is identified by the `parentNode` parameter. 添加到内部集合时，可能解释站点映射节点的 URL。The URL for a site map node might be interpreted when it is added to the internal collections. 相对于应用程序和相对 Url 扩展到应用程序绝对虚拟路径，然后在内部存储和访问的单个实例类。Application-relative and relative URLs are expanded to application-absolute virtual paths, which are then used internally to store and access the individual instances of the class. 其他 Url，如物理路径、 路径替换为在其中，协议和 UNC 路径，不会被解释。Other URLs, such as physical paths, paths with protocols in them, and UNC paths, are not interpreted. 类，该类派生自类，并且是 ASP.NET 的默认 site 映射提供程序，则使用属性对象作为其内部的集合，默认情况下中查找键。The class, which is derived from the class, and is the default site map provider for ASP.NET, uses the property of a object as a lookup key in its internal collections, by default. 如果属性设置，它必须是唯一的站点地图提供商提供作用域内。If the property of the is set, it must be unique within the scope of the site map provider. 方法尝试检索站点地图节点基于其属性。The method attempts to retrieve site map nodes based on their property. 否则，你可以使用属性和相应方法来检索站点映射节点。Otherwise, you can use the property and the corresponding method to retrieve site map nodes. 如果没有或自动生成站点地图提供商提供的指定跟踪站点地图节点。If no or is specified, the site map provider automatically generates a to track the site map nodes.

span.span: is .
The or is already registered with the .

exception.span: 站点地图节点必须由具有唯一 URL 或键的页构成。

span.span: A site map node must be made up of pages with unique URLs or keys.

para.span: 在重写方法中，确保添加站点映射节点使用时，将属性设置为一个唯一值方法。

span.span: When overriding the method, ensure that the property is set to a unique value when adding the site map node using the method.

summary.span: 在派生类中被重写时，从持久性存储区加载站点地图信息，并在内存中构建它。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, loads the site map information from persistent storage and builds it in memory.

returns.span: 站点地图导航结构的根 。

span.span: The root of the site map navigation structure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是一个抽象成员类。The method is the one abstract member of the class. 调用方法来加载和生成站点地图节点从持久性存储区。The method is called to load and build the site map node from persistent storage. 当实现方法中，确保它是线程安全的因为多个并发的页请求可以间接导致多个调用来加载站点映射信息。When you implement the method, ensure that it is thread-safe, because multiple concurrent page requests can result indirectly in multiple calls to load site map information. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何实现方法可以从 Microsoft Access 数据库中检索数据并生成添加到对象根站点映射节点的集合。The following code example demonstrates how to implement the method to retrieve data from a Microsoft Access database and build objects that are added to the collection of the root site map node. 最后，属性返回到调用方。Finally, the property is returned to the caller. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.AccessSiteMapProvider_1#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.AccessSiteMapProvider_1/CPP/accesssitemapprovider.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.AccessSiteMapProvider_1#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.AccessSiteMapProvider_1/CS/accesssitemapprovider.cs#4)] [!code-vb[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.AccessSiteMapProvider_1#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.AccessSiteMapProvider_1/VB/accesssitemapprovider.vb#4)]

para.span: 在重写方法在派生类中，请务必规范化的 Url对象添加到你的站点地图提供商提供，以便方法可以检索站点地图节点，而不管是否站点图的 URL为应用程序相对路径或绝对虚拟路径提供节点。

span.span: When overriding the method in a derived class, be sure to normalize the URLs of objects that you add to your site map provider, so that the method can retrieve a site map node regardless of whether the URL for the site map node is supplied as an absolute virtual path or application relative path.

para.span: 站点地图提供程序实施者使用方法应存储在存储之前规范化的任何 Url代表站点地图提供商提供的内部哈希表中的对象。

span.span: Site map provider implementers using the method should normalize any URLs before storing objects in the internal hash tables on behalf of the site map provider.

para.span: 中包含安全剪裁行为和类实现。

span.span: Security trimming behavior is included in the and class implementations.

para.span: 但是，使安全修整在派生类中的函数，则必须设置属性的任何生成站点地图提供商提供，当你重写时，您创建的对象方法。

span.span: However, for security trimming to function in derived classes, you must set the property of any objects that you create while building a site map provider when you override the method.

summary.span: 移除 作为其状态的一部分来跟踪的父和子站点地图节点的集合中的所有元素。

span.span: Removes all elements in the collections of child and parent site map nodes that the tracks as part of its state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 派生自的类类可以重写方法来执行其他清理，具体取决于何种状态的派生的类维护。Classes that are derived from the class can override the method to perform additional cleanup, depending on what state the derived classes maintain. 方法重新初始化期间的状态未设置方法-它将只初始化期间的状态重置方法。The method does not reset state that is initialized during the method—it resets only state that is initialized during the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写方法来执行其他清理操作由类保持的状态。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method to perform additional cleanup of state that is maintained by the class. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.AccessSiteMapProvider_1#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.AccessSiteMapProvider_1/CPP/accesssitemapprovider.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.AccessSiteMapProvider_1#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.AccessSiteMapProvider_1/CS/accesssitemapprovider.cs#3)] [!code-vb[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.AccessSiteMapProvider_1#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.AccessSiteMapProvider_1/VB/accesssitemapprovider.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 提供的 URL 通常是虚拟或绝对 URL。The provided URL is typically a virtual or absolute URL. 它还可使用 ASP.NET 应用程序相关的语法，如 URL `"~/apprelativedirectory"`。It can also be a URL that uses ASP.NET application-relative syntax, such as `"~/apprelativedirectory"`. 类自动标准化为绝对虚拟路径相对于应用程序的原始 Url。The class automatically normalizes application-relative raw URLs to an absolute virtual path. 对象，该类派生自并且是 ASP.NET 的默认 site 映射提供程序，则使用属性对象作为其内部的集合，默认情况下中查找键。The object, which is derived from the and is the default site map provider for ASP.NET, uses the property of a object as a lookup key in its internal collections, by default. 如果属性设置，它必须是唯一的站点地图提供商提供作用域内。If the property of the is set, it must be unique within the scope of the site map provider. 方法尝试检索站点地图节点基于其。The method attempts to retrieve site map nodes based on their . 否则，你可以使用属性和相应方法来检索站点映射节点。Otherwise, you can use the property and the corresponding method to retrieve site map nodes. 如果没有或自动生成站点地图提供商提供的指定属性来跟踪站点地图节点。If no or is specified, the site map provider automatically generates a property to track the site map nodes.

span.span: is .

para.span: 在重写方法在派生类中，请务必规范化的 Url对象添加到你的站点地图提供商提供，以便方法可以检索站点地图节点，而不管是否 URL 站点图为虚拟绝对路径或应用程序相对路径提供节点。

span.span: When overriding the method in a derived class, be sure to normalize the URLs of the objects that you add to your site map provider, so that the method can retrieve a site map node regardless of whether URL for the site map node is supplied as an absolute virtual path or an application relative path.

para.span: 中包含安全剪裁行为和类实现。

span.span: Security trimming behavior is included in the and class implementations.

para.span: 但是，使安全修整在派生类中的函数，则必须设置属性的任何生成站点地图提供商提供，当你重写时，您创建的对象方法。

span.span: However, for security trimming to function in derived classes, you must set the property of any objects that you create while building a site map provider when you override the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法从内部中检索站点映射节点对象基于`key`。The method retrieves a site map node from an internal object based on `key`. 对象，该类派生自类并且是 ASP.NET 的默认 site 映射提供程序，则使用属性对象作为其内部的集合，默认情况下中查找键。The object, which is derived from the class and is the default site map provider for ASP.NET, uses the property of a object as a lookup key in its internal collections, by default. 如果属性设置，它必须是唯一的站点地图提供商提供作用域内。If the property of the is set, it must be unique within the scope of the site map provider. 方法尝试检索站点地图节点基于其。The method attempts to retrieve site map nodes based on their . 否则，你可以使用属性和相应方法来检索站点映射节点。Otherwise, you can use the property and the corresponding method to retrieve site map nodes. 具有查找的实例的默认实现类基于`key`参数。The has a default implementation that looks up instances of the class based on the `key` parameter. 如果使用站点映射提供程序实施者方法，已将存储对每个引用基于值属性。If a site map provider implementer used the method, the already will have stored a reference to each based on the value of the property. 默认情况下，生成的 Guid 的实例不具有的值的类属性。By default, the generates GUIDs for instances of the class that do not have a value for the property. 自定义站点地图提供程序实施者必须提供自己的机制来生成的唯一值属性的事件中的实例类不具有的值属性。Custom site map provider implementers must provide their own mechanism for generating unique values of the property in the event that an instance of the class does not have a value for the property. 和作为 ASP.NET 的默认映射提供程序实现的类使用的 URL作为类所维护的各种集合中的键的对象。The and classes, which are the default site map provider implementation for ASP.NET, use the URL of a object as a key in the various collections that the classes maintain.

span.span: If security trimming is enabled, the collection contains only site map nodes that the user is permitted to see.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象将委托给站点地图提供商提供能够跟踪其子与父站点映射节点。The objects delegate to the site map provider to keep track of their child and parent site map nodes. 因此，实现分层站点的站点映射提供的类映射结构，如，并使用对象来表示站点映射节点必须以便能够跟踪站点映射的所有节点的分层关系导航整个层次结构树。As a result, classes that implement a site map provider for a hierarchical site map structure, such as , and use objects to represent site map nodes, must track the hierarchical relationships of all site map nodes in order to be able to navigate an entire hierarchical tree. 方法调用方法内部来检索只读的站点地图节点相对于指定的站点映射节点且与当前用户的集合。The method calls the method internally to retrieve read-only collection of site map nodes that are relative to the specified site map node and relevant to the current user.

span.span: is .

MemberSignature.Value: public override System.Web.SiteMapNode GetParentNode (System.Web.SiteMapNode node);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Web.SiteMapNode GetParentNode(class System.Web.SiteMapNode node) cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetParentNode (node As SiteMapNode) As SiteMapNode
public: override System::Web::SiteMapNode ^ GetParentNode(System::Web::SiteMapNode ^ node);

param.name: node
param.span: 要检索其父站点地图节点的 。

span.span: The for which to retrieve the parent site map node.

summary.span: 检索特定 对象的父站点地图节点。

span.span: Retrieves the parent site map node of a specific object.

returns.span: 表示指定 的父级的 ；如果不存在父站点地图节点，或者不允许用户查看父站点地图节点，则为 。

span.span: A that represents the parent of the specified ; otherwise, , if no parent site map node exists or the user is not permitted to see the parent site map node.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象将委托给站点地图提供商提供能够跟踪其子与父站点映射节点。The objects delegate to the site map provider to keep track of their child and parent site map nodes. 因此，实现分层站点的站点映射提供的类映射结构，如类，并使用对象来表示站点地图节点，必须跟踪所有站点地图节点的分层关系才能能够导航整个层次结构树。As a result, classes that implement a site map provider for a hierarchical site map structure, such as the class, and use objects to represent site map nodes, must track the hierarchical relationships of all site map nodes in order to be able to navigate an entire hierarchical tree. 如果找不到属性，类检测到当前站点地图提供商提供是否具有属性。If a property is not found, the class detects whether the current site map provider has a property. 如果这样，站点映射提供程序调用父站点地图提供商提供的属性。If so, the site map provider calls the property for the parent site map provider. 这使站点映射节点的父站点映射节点由不同站点地图提供商提供的方案。This enables the scenario where the parent site map node of a site map node is maintained by a different site map provider. 方法调用方法内部来检索，它表示指定的站点映射节点的父级。The method calls the method internally to retrieve the that represents the parent of the specified site map node. 如果启用了安全修整，仅当该用户可以看到它，则返回站点映射节点。If security trimming is enabled, the site map node is returned only if the user is permitted to see it.

span.span: is .

summary.span: 从站点地图提供程序跟踪的所有站点地图节点集合中移除指定的 对象。

span.span: Removes the specified object from all site map node collections that are tracked by the site map provider.
